attributes.action: Modify yellow line parking restrictions during COVID19 emergency.
attributes.additional_details: To enable the public to visit smaller shops and other businesses more easily and minimise walking distances and possible community transmission of COVID-19, during current emergency.
attributes.background: Modify parking restrictions on all roads with single and double yellow lines throughout UK, to allow vehicles to park for short periods of time, on roads marked with both single and double yellow lines at all times of day - say one hour for single yellow lines and half hour for double yellow lines.
